text:
Created attachment 24432
appache configuration file

Hi,

We have a siebel server on security layer will generate a http request to
reverse proxy Apache server(have internet access) which will route to correct
address based on some rules. This is working fine when i send a request from
Internet Explorer and getting response back. 

However We are getting the below error when i send a request from Siebel
Application. 

During data send, the connection with the server was reset

I am attaching our httpd config file, Requesting you to check and please let me
know If any changes required

Also please how to increase log level and where to see the errors, currently my
error log is not capturing all events

Many Thanks

Regards
Naresh T
creator: naresh.tin@gmail.com
rpluem@apache.org
text: You actually don't use the proxy. Bugzilla is no user support forum, but for reporting bugs. Please ask on the users@https.apache.org list first and come back if it turns out to be a bug.
